fullText: [1] In its efforts to promote education, Gorgias Press offers annually the Gorgias Book Grant. This program offers outstanding graduate students grants in the form of Gorgias Press publications. Grants consists of books in the value of $300.00 per grant. Each year, about three grants are distributed. [2] The 2003 Grant is in Eastern Christian Studies, and related fiels. The application deadline is October 1, 2003. The Grant date is December 2003. [3] Candidate must be enrolled in a graduate program (Master or Ph.D.) in an accredited university or an institution of learning in the field of the grant. Candidate must have the equivalence of a GPA of 3.0 or higher. [4] For application details, please visit http://www.gorgiaspress.com and click on "Book Grants".
title: Gorgias Book Grant
Hugoye: Journal of Syriac Studies
author: Kiraz, George A.
